column3: Bharat Darshan Explorer is a web application that allows users to explore the cultural richness of Indian states through real-time Wikipedia data. Users can select a state and view information about its culture, cuisine, art forms, and monuments in an interactive tabbed layout. The app helps students, travelers, and culture enthusiasts easily access region-specific knowledge. It promotes cultural awareness, supports educational learning, and preserves traditional heritage by making verified information accessible to everyone.

column7: The app allows users to search and browse Wikibooks content by topic, making it easy to find educational material. It uses AI to provide quick summaries, simpler explanations, and related topic suggestions based on what the user is reading or asking. Users can type natural language questions or prompts to get helpful responses powered by the AI. The interface is fast, responsive, and designed to work well on both desktop and mobile devices, offering a smooth and user-friendly experience for learning.
column8: The app is designed for students, teachers, and self-learners who want quick and easy access to educational content. It helps users understand complex topics with AI-powered summaries and explanations. Anyone interested in learning from Wikibooks in a simpler way can benefit from it.
